name: Fallen London: Unto Dust
storyline: Caught in the machinations of a wily Tomb-Colonist, it's up to you to save a high society funeral from disaster! Can you navigate the demands of a corpse who won't stay dead, to say nothing of his confounded relatives... In Fallen London the dead don't stay buried and the living never rest easy.
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for August, 2020.
